item.title: How I Discovered That the AWS Lambda Runtime Might Be Written in Go
item.description: Have you ever wondered how your Lambda function code is triggered? Each runtime has to conform to the AWS Lambda runtime API. In managed runtimes, you don’t need to take care of that; that’s the whole point of using a managed runtime! AWS takes care of that for you. But how? It’s hard to say because it’s not clearly documented. However, while I was conducting some unrelated experiments, I made a very cool discovery!
